title: having the directx error
body: i just got myself a laptop and i tried downloading drivers. they game worked fine untill i started downloading and updating my drivers. now i get the directx  error. im really not familiar with any of this. im sure im probably no tat the right place to ask this but it be great to get atleast some kind of help

replies.body:
This actually is **exactly the right place** to ask this! :)

Can you provide me with your graphics card model or your laptop model number so I can give you detailed instructions to resolve this? Thanks!
